sentence: But Sean Hannity is urging him to back celebrity doctor Mehmet Oz.
author: Alex Griffing
title: Trump Reportedly Weighing Double Endorsements in Tight Senate Races: ‘I Get Two Chances to Win’

sentence: Because of course they are.” Dr. Mehmet Oz, U.S. Senate candidate: “This picture encompasses everything wrong with the far left, like Stacey Abrams and the mandates harming our children.” Benjamin Weingarten, RealClearInvestigations: “So they have no explanation for why the indefensible masking of children persists while the non-Governor of Georgia—who is more at risk than the kids—gets to breathe freely.” Scott Walker, former Wisconsin governor: “This will go down as one of the dumbest political moves in history.
title: Abrams Slammed For Being Maskless Next To Masked Children: ‘This Photo Is Catastrophic’ For Democrats

sentence: | Riccardo Savi/Getty Images for Concordia Summit By Holly Otterbein and Natalie Allison 04/09/2022 06:44 PM EDT Updated: 04/09/2022 08:10 PM EDT Dr. Mehmet Oz has won the race for Donald Trump’s coveted endorsement in Pennsylvania’s Senate GOP primary.
title: Trump endorses Oz in key Senate race

sentence: +8 View gallery +8 View gallery Conservatives are grumbling over former President Donald Trump's (left) decision to back Dr. Mehmet Oz (right) in the May 17 Republican Senate primary +8 View gallery Human Events' Jack Posobiec, a Pennsylvania native, tweeted out footage of a vintage Dr. Oz episode that focused on transgender children +8 View gallery Posobiec also highlighted an Oz tweet from 2018 that suggested the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention should conduct a study on gun violence 'You're not America First.
author: Nikki Schwab
title: MAGA turns on Trump for endorsing Dr. Oz: Supporters tear into TV star's past comments on abortion and transgender issues after ex-president gave him prized backing in Pennsylvania Senate race

sentence: Saturday, during his latest coup-coup hate rally, Donald Trump officially endorsed Dr. Mehmet Oz in the GOP Pennsylvania Senate primary.
author: Stephen Robinson
title: Trump Thinks TV Quack Dr. Oz Qualified For Elected Office
